`Jul 03 04:41:32 staking-green validator[95923]: time="2020-07-03 04:41:32" level=error msg="Could not request attestation to sign at slot" error="rpc error: code = InvalidArgument desc = Attestation request must be within current or previous epoch" prefix=validator pubKey=0x9061dcdd23bd slot=29157`
